    index="my-index-000001",
)

    index="my-index-000002",
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.indices.put_mapping(
    index="my-index-000001,my-index-000002",
    properties={
        "user": {
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "keyword"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
